TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRegisteredObject

summary.span: 为宿主环境所管理的对象定义方法。

span.span: Defines methods for objects that are managed by the hosting environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象必须实现要托管环境中注册，使其生存期由宿主环境的接口。Objects must implement the interface in order to register with the hosting environment and have their lifetime managed by the hosting environment. 可以通过调用创建已注册对象的实例的应用程序管理器中的方法。You can create an instance of a registered object by calling the method on the application manager. 应用程序管理器将新创建的对象返回给调用方，然后在对象调用特定于类型的方法。The application manager returns the newly created object to the caller, which can then call a type-specific method on the object. 在启动期间，已注册的对象应调用方法以完成注册的对象。During startup, the registered object should call the method to complete registration of the object. 当应用程序管理器需要停止已注册的对象时，它将调用方法。When the application manager needs to stop a registered object, it will call the method. 应用程序可以具有已注册的类型的一个实例。Applications can have only one instance of a registered type. 若要创建已注册的类型的多个实例，使用工厂模式来创建对象管理器，与应用程序注册并管理多个实例。To create multiple instances of a registered type, use the factory pattern to create an object manager that is registered with the application and then manages the multiple instances. 有关对象的一个示例实现工厂模式，请参阅中的示例类。For an example of an object implementing the factory pattern, see the example for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Stop(bool immediate) cil managed

param.name: immediate
param.span: 如果注册对象应在返回前从宿主环境中注销，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate the registered object should unregister from the hosting environment before returning; otherwise, .

summary.span: 请求注销一个已注册对象。

span.span: Requests a registered object to unregister.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序管理器将调用方法来请求注销一个已注册的对象。The application manager will call the method to ask a registered object to unregister. 在处理期间方法中，已注册的对象必须调用方法。During processing of the method, the registered object must call the method. 与第一次调用方法`immediate`参数设置为`false`。The method is first called with the `immediate` parameter set to `false`. 该对象可以先完成处理，调用方法，并最后返回; 也可以立即返回并完成之前调用以异步方式处理方法。The object can either complete processing, call the method, and then return or it can return immediately and complete processing asynchronously before calling the method. 如果已注册的对象不会完成处理的应用程序管理器的超时时间到期时，就与再次调用方法`immediate`参数设置为`true`。If the registered object does not complete processing before the application manager's time-out period expires, the method is called again with the `immediate` parameter set to `true`. 当`immediate`参数是`true`，已注册的对象必须调用方法，然后再返回; 否则，将应用程序管理器删除其注册。When the `immediate` parameter is `true`, the registered object must call the method before returning; otherwise, its registration will be removed by the application manager.
